explanation.rules:
Rules:  
I. Stem zone = me‑ + ROOT + X  
   • me‑ : affirmative, present, indicative  
   • X (choose one) : ‑pe ‘really’, ‑fe ‘pretend to’, ‑f ‘be able to’, ‑n infinitive  

   Internal phonology  
   1. Cluster smoothing C + ‑C → CəC (epenthetic ə): de‑f‑n → defən, me‑bab‑pe → mebabəpe  
   2. Stress final closed syllable stressed; otherwise penult (defón, mešxépe)  
   3. Schwa lowering CəC(C)e → CaC(C)e (méšxe → mášxe, mešxépe → mešxápe)  

II. Finite suffix zone (absent if ‑n chosen)  
   ‑xe plural · ‑t past · ‑me conditional · ‑q̇əm negative
